rules_text: {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Adjunct Chronomancer: You may cast target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard this turn. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Manipulating a coin through time is novel, though nothing more than a naive party trick. Prove your worth and try it on me.”
—Clairvoyant Arli [/i]
